          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Auxiliary Verbs 1</string>
            <string language="en">Auxiliary Verbs 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliche Verben 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verbes Auxiliaires 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verbos Auxiliares 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verbi Ausiliarii 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βοηθητικά ρήματα 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verbos auxiliares 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you practise the use of auxiliary verbs by using them in a context.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you practice the use of auxiliary verbs by using them in a context. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>
            <string language="sv">auxiliary verbs</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
            <string language="en">auxiliary verb</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung üben Sie den Gebrauch von 
zusätzlichen Verben, indem Sie sie in einem Kontext verwenden. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous pratiquez l'utilisation 
des verbes auxiliaires en les utilisant dans un contexte. Safir 
- l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 - combien 
coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você pratica o uso de verbos 
auxiliares usando os em um contexto. Safir - vida do inglês e 
de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione vi esercitate nell'uso dei
verbi ausiliarii usando in un contesto. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση ασκείτε τη χρήση των βοηθητικών 
ρημάτων με τη χρησιμοποίηση τους σε ένα πλαίσιο. Safir -
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2
- πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted practica el uso de verbos
auxiliares usándolos en un contexto. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
